commands.name: Code Revision Level
commands.description: This command requests the revision level of the embedded system's software. It is used for diagnostic purposes and may be needed if you ever contact the Lutron Technical Assistance Hotline for assistance.

commands.name: Select Scene
commands.description: Selects any scene on the specified GRAFIK Eye Control Units.

args.name: Control Units
args.description: Control units to select (1-8, one entry per control unit)

examples.description: Select scene 2 on Control Unit A1
Select scene 16 on Control Units A7 and A8

commands.name: Scene Lock
commands.description: Place the specified GRAFIK Eye Control Units in or out of Scene Lock.

args.name: Lock Status
args.description: +/-: Add or remove the control units from scene lock

args.name: Control Units
args.description: Control units to select (1-8, one entry per control unit)

examples.description: Release all Control Units from scene lock
Release only Control Unit 1 from scene lock

commands.name: Request Scene Status
commands.description: Report the scene status of all Control Units on the link.

response.description: ss  [S1][S2][S3][S4][S5][S6][S7][S8]: [Sx]: Scene currently selected on Control Unit at address x

examples.description: Control Unit at address 1 is in scene 1, Control Unit at address 2 is in scene 10, Control units at addresses 3-8 are missing (M)

commands.name: Zone Lower
commands.description: Ramps down specific zones on a single GRAFIK Eye Control Unit. This command will not affect shade zones.

examples.description: Ramp down all zones on Control Unit 5
Ramp down zones 1, 2, and 4 on Control Unit 3

commands.name: Zone Lower Stop
commands.description: This command is a shortcut for stopping all ramping down on all Control Units.

commands.name: Zone Raise
commands.description: Ramps up specific zones on a single GRAFIK Eye Control Unit. This command will not affect shade zones.

examples.description: Ramp up all zones on Control Unit 5
Ramp up zones 1, 2, and 4 on Control Unit 3

commands.name: Zone Raise Stop
commands.description: This command is a shortcut for stopping all ramping up on all Control Units.
